area_raw: squares on the ground in a 15-foot burst
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Mud Pit](/Spells.aspx?ID=2009)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=585" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=732" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 248 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deity**
[Keltheald](/Deities.aspx?ID=474)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Area** squares on the ground in a 15-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Thick, clinging mud covers the ground, 1 foot deep. The mud is [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453).
name: Mud Pit

text: Mud Pit Three Actions Source Player Core 2 pg. 248 1.1 Traditions Arcane, Primal Deity Keltheald Range 60 feet Area squares on the ground in a 15-foot burst Duration 1 minute --- Thick, clinging mud covers the ground, 1 foot deep. The mud is difficult terrain.
